bibl.title: Five Enigmatic Late Roman Settlements in the Eastern Desert. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Description of the sites. - Discussion and conclusion. - A wide variety of possible purposes for these settlements (Vth-VIIth centuries) are discussed.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Hans BARNARD and Gillian PYKE, Five Enigmatic Late Roman Settlements in the Eastern Desert. Avec résumé en anglais.
JEA 88 (2002) pp. 187-225, 2 tabl., 24 figg. et plans.
Introduction. - Description of the sites. - Discussion and conclusion. - A wide variety of possible purposes for these settlements (Vth-VIIth centuries) are discussed.
